title: Joe Biden's Unwelcome Affection & Trump Exacerbates the Immigration Crisis | Hakeem Jeffries
itunes:title: Joe Biden's Unwelcome Affection & Trump Exacerbates the Immigration Crisis | Hakeem Jeffries
description:
Joe Biden is accused of touching women inappropriately, President Trump cuts off aid to Central American countries, and New York Rep. Hakeem Jeffries sits down with Trevor.
